mapper.insert: insert into UN_TARUN ( arun_arun, arun_usua, arun_prun, arun_tpar, arun_earun, arun_url, arun_hash, arun_bytes, arun_nombre, arun_observ, arun_fcrea, arun_extension, arun_registros, arun_archivos ) values ( #{arun_arun}, #{arun_usua}, #{arun_prun}, #{arun_tpar}, #{arun_earun}, #{arun_url}, #{arun_hash}, #{arun_bytes}, #{arun_nombre}, #{arun_observ}, now(), #{arun_extension}, #{arun_registros}, #{arun_archivos} )

insert into un_tharun ( harun_arun, harun_earun, harun_fasig,harun_usua, harun_obser)
values ( #{harun_arun}, #{harun_earun}, now(), #{harun_usua}, #{harun_obser} )
